price: 31. Dan op de Dag der Opstanding zullen jullie voor jullie Heer redetwisten.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
